name: Ex-Machina (AaronDrinkwater)
description: Robo-Lab is a 2D Top down management, strategy, base building simulation game. In this game players will start of by slowly generating power and money so that once a stable room are set up with power and money the player can earn research points to get better robots, rooms and a bigger.  The end goal of the game is to create the 'God AI' that will trigger the game to Finish. It is your job to get to this point, earning as much power, money and research points by playing and managing the game appropriately.
